Uses of Interface
twitter4j.Trends

  • Packages that use Trends 
    Package Description
    twitter4j.api  
    twitter4j.json  

    • Uses of Trends in twitter4j.api

      Methods in twitter4j.api that return Trends 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Trends TrendsResources.getLocationTrends(int woeid)
      Deprecated. 
      use TrendsResources.getPlaceTrends(int) instead
      Trends TrendsResources.getPlaceTrends(int woeid)
      Returns the top 10 trending topics for a specific WOEID, if trending information is available for it.
      The response is an array of "trend" objects that encode the name of the trending topic, the query parameter that can be used to search for the topic on Twitter Search, and the Twitter Search URL.
      This information is cached for 5 minutes.

    • Uses of Trends in twitter4j.json

      Methods in twitter4j.json that return Trends 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Trends DataObjectFactory.createTrends(String rawJSON)
      Constructs a Trends object from rawJSON string.
